1: וַנֵּ֣פֶן <sup>6437 </sup> <n>Then we turned</n> וַנַּ֔עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and went up</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>to Bashan</n> וַיֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came out</n> עוֹג֩ <sup>5747 </sup> <n>and Og</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> לִקְרָאתֵ֜נוּ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> ה֧וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַמּ֛וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>us he and all his people</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n> אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <sup>154 </sup> <n>at Edrei</n>
2: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֣א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>unto me Fear</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>into</n> בְיָדְךָ֞ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into thy hand</n> נָתַ֧תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>him not for I will deliver</n> אֹת֛וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַמּ֖וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>him and all his people</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצ֑וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and his land</n> וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and thou shalt do</n> לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עָשִׂ֗יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto him as thou didst</n> לְסִיחֹן֙ <sup>5511 </sup> <n>unto Sihon</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>which dwelt</n> בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <sup>2809 </sup> <n>at Heshbon</n>
3: וַיִּתֵּן֩ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>delivered</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>So the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>our God</n> בְּיָדֵ֗נוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into our hands</n> גַּ֛ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ע֥וֹג <sup>5747 </sup> <n>Og</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>also the king</n> הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all his people</n> וַנַּכֵּ֕הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and we smote</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> בִּלְתִּ֥י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>no</n> הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>him until none was left</n> ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <sup>8300 </sup> <n>to him remaining</n>
4: וַנִּלְכֹּ֤ד <sup>3920 </sup> <n>And we took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָרָיו֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>all his cities</n> בָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>at that time</n> הַהִ֔וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הָֽיְתָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> קִרְיָ֔ה <sup>7151 </sup> <n>there was not a city</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> לָקַ֖חְנוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>which we took</n> מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <sup>8346 </sup> <n>not from them threescore</n> עִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֶ֣בֶל <sup>2256 </sup> <n>all the region</n> אַרְגֹּ֔ב <sup>709 </sup> <n>of Argob</n> מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <sup>4467 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n> ע֖וֹג <sup>5747 </sup> <n>of Og</n> בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <sup>1316 </sup> <n>in Bashan</n>

6: וַנַּחֲרֵ֣ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>And we utterly destroyed</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>them</n> עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>them as we did</n> לְסִיחֹ֖ן <sup>5511 </sup> <n>unto Sihon</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <sup>2809 </sup> <n>of Heshbon</n> הַחֲרֵם֙ <sup>2763 </sup> <n>utterly destroying</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of every city</n> מְתִ֔ם <sup>4962 </sup> <n>the men</n> הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>women</n> וְהַטָּֽף׃ <sup>2945 </sup> <n>and children</n>
7: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>But all the cattle</n> וּשְׁלַ֥ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>and the spoil</n> הֶעָרִ֖ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the cities</n> בַּזּ֥וֹנוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>we took for a prey</n> לָֽנוּ׃
